:::Ramjet/Torca:::

::he follows Kluster and Shredder::
------------------------------------------------------------------------------

---------------------------------------------
::Torca gets hit by the missle and gets blown backwards.  He opens up a comm 
to any Maximals in the CF::
Torca: Attention all Maximals!  This is Torca.  Skulletron, an Allience 
member is attacking me.  he must be disposed of now!
::As he says this he fires 25 shots at Skulletron::
